comments.body: shall we still keep `site.SCALA_VERSION`? `https://www.scala-lang.org/api/current/scala` may point to scala 2.13 in the future.
comments.diffHunk:

 by a key.
 
 In Java, key-value pairs are represented using the

+[scala.Tuple2](https://www.scala-lang.org/api/current/scala/Tuple2.html) class

comments.body: That's fine, I found the new URL pattern. I really doubt it will change, but hey.
